node.title: Family of Melbourne woman who died after 'unnecessary' CT scan calls for change
node.alt: A woman smiling at the camera.
node.description: A lawyer for the family of Melbourne mother-of-two Peta Hickey says they intend to launch civil action after the Victorian coroner finds doctors' poor judgement, inadequate training and lax industry standards contributed to the death.
node.content:
["The grieving family of Melbourne mother Peta Hickey says it will continue to pursue justice over her death two years ago following a voluntary workplace health check.", "Ms Hickey had an allergic reaction to the contrast dye used during\u00a0a CT scan and died from multiple organ failure in May 2019.", "Coroner Simon McGregor has handed down his findings after an inquest into Ms Hickey's\u00a0death.", "He found failed\u00a0checks and balances by health service providers, inadequate anaphylaxis\u00a0training for radiologists and a well-meaning but short-sighted workplace health program all contributed to the death.", "The family of the 43-year-old mother of two have described her as a beautiful, warm, generous and fun-loving person.", "\"Right now, Peta should be getting excited with our daughter Maggie as she prepares to start 'big school' next year,\" husband Richard Hickey said.", "\"She should be rehearsing lines with our son Max for his upcoming performance in the school musical.", "\"Instead, we prepare for those milestones and another Christmas without Peta as we have done every day since she went to work two and a half years ago and didn't come home.\"", "", "
Peta Hickey's husband Richard Hickey reads a statement after the coroner handed down his findings.(ABC News: Zalika Rizmal)
", "Ms Hickey's brother, Gary Hickey, said sitting through his sister's inquest was\u00a0confronting.", "\"What became clear was the cause of her death was due to so many failures,\" he said.", "\"Those responsible in any way need to acknowledge their role and take ownership, if not for the health system in our country then for ourselves. This cannot happen to another person or family.\"", "
Patients referred without seeing a doctor
", "Ms Hickey was working for labour hire company\u00a0Programmed\u00a0in 2018 when her employer suggested she get\u00a0a voluntary\u00a0heart check after a colleague suffered a non-fatal cardiac arrest.", "The inquest heard Ms Hickey did not have any history of heart problems and was not assessed by a doctor before the scan.", "Instead, corporate\u00a0booking service, Priority Care Health Solutions, had been using\u00a0the electronic signature of its occupational health consultant\u00a0Dr Doumit Saad\u00a0on\u00a0referral forms, despite him never meeting the patients.", "Medical imaging booking service, MRI Now, used the referrals to send\u00a0Ms Hickey to Future Medical Imaging Group (FMIG) in Moonee Ponds for the CT scan.", "Coroner McGregor found Priority's decision to insert Dr Saad's signature on the\u00a0forms deceived\u00a0radiology clinics which received the\u00a0referrals.", "", "
Peta Hickey died after suffering a reaction to dye used in a CT scan.(Supplied)
", "The inquest also heard FMIG radiologist\u00a0Gavin Tseng\u00a0had only received general anaphylaxis training, and was unaware of any resuscitation instructions\u00a0being displayed at the Moonee Ponds clinic.", "Mr McGregor said it appeared Dr Tseng was not adequately trained or prepared for Ms Hickey's severe reaction.", "\"The conduct of doctors Saad and Tseng departed from normal professional practices,\" he said.", "He found Ms Hickey died as a result of substandard clinical judgements\u00a0and the misalignment of\u00a0business incentives to engage others in facilitating\u00a0the\u00a0health checks.", "Maurice Blackburn principal lawyer Kathryn Booth has alleged putting a patient through an invasive cardiac test without first seeing a doctor was ill-conceived and negligent.", "\"It's unbelievable, and as the coroner found today, her heart was fine. It was a totally unnecessary test,\" she said.", "Ms Booth said the family intended to pursue civil action in the Victorian Supreme Court after reviewing the findings in more detail.", "
Doctors referred to health regulator\u00a0
", "Mr McGregor found the decision of Ms Hickey's employer Programmed to introduce the health check was well intentioned but\u00a0did not take into account\u00a0the risks of asymptomatic patients receiving CT scans.\u00a0", "He found Programmed, Priority Care Health Solutions, MRI Now, Dr\u00a0Saad and Dr Tseng all contributed Ms Hickey's death.\u00a0", "Mr McGregor\u00a0has directed that\u00a0the\u00a0Australian Health Practitioner Regulation Agency (AHPRA) be notified that Dr Saad's actions were unethical and unsafe\u00a0in allowing his electronic signature be used on referrals for patients\u00a0he had not reviewed, and Dr Tseng had failed to recognise Ms Hickey's allergic reaction and\u00a0administer adrenaline.", "The inquest heard FMIG's policies and procedures for the recognition and treatment of adverse reactions did meet current industry standards.", "The coroner has\u00a0recommended\u00a0an Australia-wide\u00a0mandate that\u00a0all radiologists\u00a0 who work\u00a0with contrast dye be\u00a0trained to recognise and respond to severe allergic reactions every three years, and be taught\u00a0CPR.", "He also wants an official\u00a0review of appropriate screening for CT angiograms and other invasive cardiac tests in Australia.", "Mr McGregor\u00a0has recommended the Commonwealth health minister, Greg Hunt, produce standard referral forms for diagnostic imaging practices.", "He has urged the Australian Competition and Consumer Commission to consider whether action should be taken against Priority Care Health Solutions and\u00a0MRI Now.", "
Employer 'deeply sorry' that well-intentioned program led to death
", "In a statement, Ms Hickey's employer, Programmed, welcomed the coroner's findings.", "\"We were deeply saddened by Peta's tragic death in 2019. Peta was a valued, respected, and well-liked member of our team and she is sorely missed,\" the company said.", "\"As a company, we have welcomed the coroner's recommendations, which include improving patient communication and pre-emptive medical consultation in programs of this nature.", "\"While we have discontinued the Cardiac Health Assessment Program, and our relationship with Priority Care, our focus has always been, and continues to be, to help members of our team proactively look after their health.", "\"Once again, we would like to express our sincere condolences to Peta Hickey's family.", "\"We are deeply sorry that a program implemented with the intention of helping and protecting our staff led to the tragic passing of a valued member of our team.\"", "Dr Saad was employed by health provider Jobfit.", "In a statement, the company noted the coroner had found \"no evidence\" it had any knowledge of the referrals being generated in Dr Saad's name."]
